statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{x^{3} - 5 \, x^{2} + 5 \, x - 4 , -22 \, x^{3} + 5 \, x^{2} - 15 \, x - 7 , x^{3} + 5 \, x^{2} + 5 \, x + 2 , 4 \, x^{3} + x^{2} + x + 3 , -12 \, x^{3} - 3 \, x^{2} - 3 \, x - 9\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
